item.title: 调查发现，巴西酒吧和餐馆销售额因饮料中毒事件而下降
item.description: 周一，支付公司 Stone 和巴西酒吧与餐馆协会 Abrasel 公布的数据显示，由于酒精饮料中甲醇污染事件日益增多，9 月份巴西酒吧和餐馆的销售额与 8 月份相比下降了 4.9%。【原文：Sales in Brazilian bars and restaurants dropped 4.9% in September compared to August amid growing cases of methanol contamination in alcoholic beverages, data released by payment company Stone and the Brazilian Association of Bars and Restaurants Abrasel showed on Monday.】

item.title: 绿色能源公司 DeepGreenX 在持续停产中终止直接上市计划
item.description: 绿色能源和技术公司 DeepGreenX 集团周一撤回了其在美国直接上市的注册声明，因为联邦政府关门已满 20 天。【原文：Green energy and technology company DeepGreenX Group withdrew its registration statement for a direct listing in the United States on Monday, as the federal government shutdown hit the 20-day mark.】

item.title: 加拿大银行称贸易紧张局势下企业前景依然低迷
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee 和 David Ljunggren【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: 阿里-伊曼纽尔的 MARI 收购数字票务平台 TodayTix
item.description: 全球活动公司 MARI 周一表示，该公司已收购 TodayTix Group (TTG)，从而获得其平台的使用权，这些平台销售从纽约歌剧到伦敦皇家莎士比亚剧团等各种现场演出的门票。【原文：Global events company MARI said on Monday it has acquired TodayTix Group (TTG), getting access to its platforms that sell tickets for live performances ranging from operas in New York to plays by London's Royal Shakespeare Company.】

item.title: 稳健的交易量将支撑美国交易所的业绩，泡沫喋喋不休成为焦点
item.description: 随着股票和期权交易量的强劲增长，美国主要交易所运营商将公布稳健的第三季度业绩报告。【原文：Major U.S. exchange operators are set to report a solid third quarter as robust trading in equities and options lifts volumes, a surge that has prompted some analysts to question whether parts of the market are in a bubble.】

item.title: Archer Aviation 与大韩航空就 eVTOL 空中出租车达成协议
item.description: Archer Aviation 周一表示，该公司与大韩航空（Korean Air）签署了一项合作协议，在韩国商业化其电动空中出租车，可能购买多达 100 架飞机。【原文：Archer Aviation on Monday said it signed a partnership with Korean Air to commercialize its electric air taxis in South Korea, with a potential purchase of up to 100 aircraft.】

item.title: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）局长称，由于太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）落后，美国将寻求竞争对手竞标阿耳特弥斯3号（Artemis 3
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）的最高官员周一表示，美国航天局将开放阿耳特弥斯3号（Artemis 3）登月任务的合同，以便与SpaceX竞争，他说SpaceX的进度落后于计划。【原文：NASA's top official on Monday said the U.S. space agency was opening up the contract for its Artemis 3 moon mission to compete against SpaceX, which he said was running behind schedule.】

item.title: 莫尔森-科尔斯（Molson Coors）将在重组中裁减 9% 的美洲员工
item.description: 啤酒生产商莫尔森-科尔斯饮料公司（Molson Coors Beverage Company）周一表示，作为公司重组计划的一部分，该公司将在 12 月底之前在美洲业务部门裁员约 400 人，占员工总数的 9%。【原文：Beer maker Molson Coors Beverage Company said on Monday it would cut about 400 jobs, or 9% of the workforce, across its Americas business by the end of December as part of a corporate restructuring plan for the unit.】

item.title: Arm 扩展人工智能授权计划，提升设备上的人工智能市场份额
item.description: Arm Holdings 周一表示，它正在扩大其 "灵活接入"（Flexible Access）许可计划，以涵盖其 Armv9 边缘人工智能平台，旨在通过降低准入门槛和加快设计周期来吸引开发设备上人工智能的初创企业和设备制造商。【原文：Arm Holdings said on Monday it is expanding its Flexible Access licensing program to cover its Armv9 edge AI platform, aiming to attract startups and device makers developing on‑device AI by lowering entry barriers and accelerating design cycles.】

item.title: 中国电池制造商 CATL 第三季度利润增长加快
item.description: 中国电动汽车电池巨头 CATL 第三季度净利润增长加快，尽管它面临着来自较小竞争对手的更激烈竞争。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle battery giant CATL saw net profit growth accelerate in the third quarter, even as it faced increased competition from smaller rivals.】

item.title: 瑞波支持的 Evernorth 将在美国上市融资逾 10 亿美元，囤积 XRP 代币
item.description: 由数字资产公司瑞波（Ripple）支持的新加密企业 Evernorth 周一表示，将通过与空白支票公司 Armada Acquisition Corp II 合并的方式在纳斯达克上市，预计将募集超过 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：Evernorth, a new crypto venture backed by digital asset firm Ripple, said on Monday it will list on the Nasdaq through a merger with blank-check firm Armada Acquisition Corp II and is expected to raise more than $1 billion in proceeds.】

item.title: 来自美国和中国的大量白银缓解了伦敦现货市场的挤压
item.description: 交易商和分析师表示，过去一周，大量白银从美国和中国流向伦敦现货市场，缓解了全球最大场外贵金属交易中心的流动性紧张状况。【原文：Large flows of silver from the U.S. and China to London's spot market in the past week are easing a liquidity squeeze in the world's largest over-the-counter precious metals trading hub, traders and analysts said.】

item.title: 解说：为什么 Gucci 的所有者 Kering 要将其美容业务出售给欧莱雅？
item.description: 古驰（Gucci）的所有者开云集团（Kering）已同意以 40 亿欧元（47 亿美元）的价格将其美容业务出售给欧莱雅集团（L'Oreal），这也是新任首席执行官卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo）的一次战略转移。【原文：Gucci-owner Kering has agreed to sell its beauty business to L'Oreal for 4 billion euros ($4.7 billion) in a strategic shift by new CEO Luca de Meo, who is trying to cut the luxury group's debt and refocus on its fashion business.】

item.title: 美国银行溃败引发交易猜测，信贷担忧迫在眉睫
item.description: 据四位业内资深人士透露，由于大买家可能会被刺激寻求吞并规模较小或实力较弱的竞争对手，因此围绕美国银行贷款损失风险的担忧加剧了对更多并购的预期。【原文：Jitters around U.S. banks' exposure to loan losses have fueled expectations for more mergers and acquisitions as big buyers may be spurred to look to absorb smaller or weaker rivals, according to four senior industry sources.】

item.title: 信贷风险引发恐慌，美国地区银行财报考验投资者神经
item.description: 本周，美国一些地区性银行出现了不良贷款和欺诈问题，投资者正等待这些银行发布更多的财报，以查看是否有迹象表明整个行业出现了更大范围的紧张。【原文：After a turbulent week in which some regional U.S. banks flagged bad loan and fraud issues, investors are now awaiting for more earnings reports from the lenders to check for signs of a wider strain across the sector.】

item.title: 美国就校车周围安全问题调查 Waymo 机器人出租车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周一表示，在有报道称Waymo自动驾驶汽车在靠近停靠的校车时出现不安全行为后，该局已对约2000辆Waymo自动驾驶汽车展开调查。【原文：The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Monday it has opened an investigation into about 2,000 Waymo self-driving vehicles after reports the robotaxis behaved unsafely near stopped school buses.】

item.title: 越南廉价航空公司 Vietjet 结束中国商飞飞机的运营，消息人士称
item.description: 越南低成本航空公司 Vietjet 于 10 月 18 日停止运营两架中国制造的中国商飞 C909 飞机，因为这两架飞机的六个月租赁合同到期。【原文：Vietnamese low-cost carrier Vietjet stopped operating two Chinese-made COMAC C909 aircraft on October 18 after a six-month lease contract for the planes expired, two sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美联储仍准备降息，但对美国数据真空的担忧加剧
item.description: 美联储下周将召开政策会议，但由于美国政府停摆，关键数据暂停发布，美联储对经济的看法变得模糊不清。【原文：The Federal Reserve will go into a policy meeting next week with its view of the economy obscured by a U.S. government shutdown that has suspended the release of key data, a less-than-ideal situation for policymakers divided over which risks deserve the most attention.】

item.title: WeightWatchers 与亚马逊合作，轻松配送减肥药
item.description: WeightWatchers 周一表示，它将与亚马逊合作，为其会员提供包括注射用 GLP-1 肥胖治疗在内的药物，这家远程医疗服务提供商称，此举将使一些客户更容易获得处方。【原文：WeightWatchers said on Monday it will partner with Amazon to deliver medications including injectable GLP-1 obesity treatments for its members, a move the telehealth provider said will make it easier for some customers to receive prescriptions.】

item.title: 全球企业受美国350多亿美元关税冲击，但前景趋于稳定
item.description: 进入第三季度财报后，全球企业已经预计美国关税将带来 350 多亿美元的成本，但由于新的贸易协议降低了唐纳德-特朗普总统的征税风险，许多企业都下调了最初的预期。【原文：Global companies have flagged more than $35 billion in costs from U.S. tariffs heading into third-quarter earnings, but many are lowering their initial forecasts as new trade deals reduce exposure to President Donald Trump's levies.】

item.title: F5 黑客攻击暴露广泛风险，网络防御者敲响警钟
item.description: 上周，网络安全公司 F5 遭到长达一年多的数字入侵，并被归咎于中国间谍。【原文：A more than year-long digital intrusion into cybersecurity company F5 , publicized last week and blamed on Chinese spies, has defenders across the industry hunting for signs of compromise among the many corporate networks that use its products.】

item.title: 企业盈利势头增强，华尔街期货上涨
item.description: 华尔街期货周一走高，投资者在等待重量级企业的财报和一份推迟发布的通胀报告，该报告可能会在本周晚些时候引发新的市场波动。【原文：Wall Street futures edged higher on Monday, as investors awaited earnings from corporate heavyweights and a delayed inflation report that could trigger fresh market moves later this week.】

item.title: 独家：Meta 内部研究显示，Instagram 向易受伤害的青少年展示了更多 "邻近饮食失调 "的内容
item.description: 根据路透社查阅的一份内部文件，Meta 研究人员发现，那些报告 Instagram 经常让他们对自己的身体感觉不好的青少年看到的 "饮食失调邻近内容 "明显多于那些没有报告的青少年。【原文：Meta researchers found that teens who report that Instagram regularly made them feel bad about their bodies saw significantly more “eating disorder adjacent content” than those who did not, according to an internal document reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 中国消费者就苹果应用商店行为提起反垄断诉讼
item.description: 55名中国iPhone和iPad用户的代表律师周一向中国市场监管部门投诉，称苹果公司滥用市场支配地位，将应用分发和支付限制在自己的平台上，同时收取高额佣金。【原文：A group of 55 Chinese iPhone and iPad users filed a complaint with China's market regulator on Monday, a lawyer representing the group said, alleging that Apple abuses its market dominance by restricting app distribution and payments to its own platforms while charging high commissions.】

item.title: 聚焦：发动机短缺如何将几乎全新的空客喷气机送进废品收购站
item.description: 在西班牙东部的卡斯特隆机场，身着防护服的工人在一架近乎全新的空中客车喷气式飞机的舱门里蠕动，像剥开一条机械鲸鱼的内脏一样剥离零件。卡斯特隆曾经是一座半荒废的机场，如今已成为陷入全球发动机危机的飞机的坟场。【原文：At Castellon airport in eastern Spain, workers in hazmat suits wriggle through hatches of a nearly new Airbus jet, stripping out parts as if gutting a mechanical whale. Once a semi-deserted airport, Castellon has become a graveyard for aircraft caught in a global engine crisis.】

item.title: 亚马逊云计算部门报告全球网络中断，许多网站和应用程序瘫痪
item.description: 亚马逊的云服务部门 AWS 周一遭遇故障，导致全球许多公司出现连接问题，并中断了包括 Fortnite 和 Snapchat 在内的多个热门网站和应用程序的服务。【原文：Amazon's cloud services unit AWS was hit by an outage on Monday, causing connectivity issues for many companies around the world and disrupting services for several popular websites and apps including Fortnite and Snapchat.】

item.title: 研究公司称，iPhone 17 在中国和美国的早期销量比前代产品高出 14
item.description: 研究公司 Counterpoint 周一称，苹果公司的 iPhone 17 系列在中国和美国的早期销量超过了前一代产品。【原文：Apple's iPhone 17 series outperformed its predecessor in early sales in China and the United States, research firm Counterpoint said on Monday.】

item.title: 早间竞标：高市贸易卷土重来
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 中国 9 月七年来首次未进口美国大豆
item.description: 9 月份，中国没有从美国进口大豆，这是自 2018 年 11 月以来首次降至零，而南美的大豆装运量则比上年同期激增，原因是在世界两大经济体之间持续的贸易争端期间，买家避开了美国的货物。【原文：China imported no soybeans from the U.S. in September, the first time since November 2018 that shipments fell to zero, while South American shipments surged from a year earlier, as buyers shunned American cargoes during the ongoing trade dispute between the world's two largest economies.】

item.title: 中国新房价格以 11 个月来最快速度下跌
item.description: 9 月份，中国新房价格创下了 11 个月以来的最快降幅，这加剧了房地产行业对更广泛经济增长的拖累，因为政策制定者正竭力重振萎靡不振的房地产市场。【原文：China's new home prices fell at the fastest pace in 11 months in September, worsening the property sector's drag on broader economic growth as policymakers struggle to revive the flailing market.】
